ANU.name: Theodore Ell
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
interest: * Modern Italian literature and history* Literature from and about Lebanon and the Levant* Literary representations of conflict, survival and resilience* Literary travelogues* Philology and biography* Archival research methods* Methods for transcribing and interpreting archival documents
ANU.biography: Theo is himself a poet and has published extensively in Australian anthologies and newspapers, including The Australian, The Canberra Times and The Sydney Morning Herald. In 2012, he co-founded the journal of international literature Contrappasso Magazine, which he served as co-editor for four years. In 2021, he will complete a poetry collection.
